keywords: Australian of the Year 2022,Dylan Alcott,Australian of the Year,australian of the year 2021,young australian of the year 2022,2022 Australian of the Year
description:
Tennis player Dylan Alcott is named 2022 Australian of the Year for his work as a disability advocate.
'Luckiest guy in this country': Dylan Alcott is Australian of the Year

topicText:
Paralympian and disability advocate Dylan Alcott named 2022 ...
Tennis player Dylan Alcott is named 2022 Australian of the Year for his work as a disability advocate.
'Luckiest guy in this country': Dylan Alcott is Australian of the Year
Paralympic champion and tennis golden grand slam winner Dylan Alcott is the 2022 Australian of the Year.
Tennis star and Paralympian Dylan Alcott named Australian of the ...
It's the first time in the award's 62-year history a person with a disability has taken out the top gong.
Tennis champion Dylan Alcott named 2022 Australian of the Year
For the first time in the award program's 62 year history, a person with a disability has received the top honour.
Incredible 62-year first as Dylan Alcott crowned Australian of the Year
On the tennis court, Alcott has won 23 quad wheelchair Grand Slam titles and a Newcombe Medal – awarded to the most Australian outstanding tennis players in a ...
Dylan Alcott named Australian of the Year
The tennis champion and golden slam winner is the first person with a disability to receive the national honour in its 62-year history.
